S_s: In this brief film we are given a snapshot of the mindset of Chinese in their 20s who are in love with nightlife , but are intent on preserving their physical health , including looks , even as they burn the candle at both ends.
S_f: In the brief film we are given a snapshot of the mindset of Chinese in their 20s who are in love with nightlife , but are intent on preserving their physical health , including looks , even as they burn the candle at both ends.
T_s: 在这部简短的影片中，我们简要了解了20多岁的中国人的心态，他们热爱夜生活，但一心要保持身体健康，包括外表，即使他们两头烧蜡烛。
T_f: 在这部短片中，我们看到了20多岁的中国人的心态快照，他们热爱夜生活，但一心要保持身体健康，包括外表，即使他们两头烧蜡烛。

S_s: It ’ s a way of portraying these nations as forces for good in the world , rather than necessarily interrogating the parts of the history which makes them something very different.

T_f: 这是一种将这些国家描绘成世界上向善的力量的方式，而不是一定要审视使它们变得截然不同的历史部分。

S_s: When he decided to release his first new single of this year , Chan wanted to share his feelings about the experience of being affected by the viral outbreak and most importantly , to tell people that you are not alone.

S_s: Players and coaches were confined to four walls for the entirety of the quarantine , only entering the room door to collect food , get tested for the virus and dispose of rubbish.
S_f: Players and coaches were confined to four walls for the entirety of the quarantine , only entering the room door to collect food , get tested for the virus or dispose of rubbish.

S_s: The latest VR technology and 3d filming makes it possible to see the magnificent natural landscapes of Huangshan county , exquisite architecture of the Summer Palace , splendid views of Jiuzhaigou and sacred serenity of Potala Palace with just a few clicks.
S_f: The latest VR technology and 3d filming makes it possible to see the magnificent natural landscapes of Huangshan county , exquisite architecture of the Summer Palace , splendid views of Jiuzhaigou and sacred serenity of Potala Palace in just a few clicks.
